titleStmt.title: Canterburies potion wherein is shewed the great art of his doctor in finding out the nature of his disease : together with the medicines hee applied, and the strange effects they wrought in him, to the great ease of his surcharged body / collected from the doctors owne hand.

Canterburies potion wherein is shewed the great art of his doctor in finding out the nature of his disease : together with the medicines hee applied, and the strange effects they wrought in him, to the great ease of his surcharged body / collected from the doctors owne hand.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in St. Paul's Cathedral, London, England.
